source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_00<tab>Bowlord Lewin would have you ascertain the veracity of the ominous rumors circulating about Gridania of late.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_00<tab>神勇隊のリュウィンは、冒険者に調査を依頼したいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_01<tab>Rumors of a ghostly presence in the Shroud have struck fear into the hearts of the Gridanian populace. Speak to the residents to see if there is any credible information to be had.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_01<tab>黒衣森に漆黒の鎧の亡霊騎士が出るという噂が広まっているらしい。グリダニアの市街で、人々から情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_02<tab>You have succeeded in gathering information from the townspeople. Convey what you have learned to Bowlord Lewin.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_02<tab>亡霊騎士について情報を集めた。神勇隊司令室の「リュウィン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_03<tab>Bowlord Lewin is grateful for your efforts, but it would appear your findings have put him ill at ease. That which strikes fear into the heart of the Bowlord must be a grave threat indeed.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_SEQ_03<tab>リュウィンに報告した。苦渋に満ちた口ぶりのリュウィンだが……いったい、どういうことなのだろうか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TODO_00<tab>Gather information from the residents of Gridania.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TODO_00<tab>グリダニアの市街で情報を集める
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TODO_01<tab>神勇隊司令室のリュウインに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_000<tab>I shall proceed directly to the matter at hand. Though still unsubstantiated, ill rumors stir amongst the townspeople of late─rumors of a shadow-clad knight who rides in the Shroud.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_000<tab>さっそくだが、未確認の蛮神についてだ……。
グリダニアでは、黒衣森に漆黒の鎧に身を包んだ、
亡霊騎士が出るという噂が広がっている。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_002<tab>Under normal circumstances, I would pay such idle ghost stories little heed. This time, however, we have reason to suspect...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_002<tab>ただの怪談話なら、我々で対処できるのだが、
今回の噂は事情が違っていてな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_003<tab>...But we have naught to gain by rushing to judgment. I would have you go to the streets, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Speak with the people, and hear their words with your own ears.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_003<tab>なぜなら……いや、やめよう。
まずは冷静な第三者の意見を聞きたい。
目撃者から事情聴取をしてきてくれないか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_CHANSTELOUP_000_010<tab>The ghost knight? Aye, I saw him. Clad from head to toe in armor that seemed forged from shadow itself, galloping through the Shroud atop his hells-born steed.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_CHANSTELOUP_000_010<tab>亡霊騎士……ああ、見たな。
上から下までを漆黒の鎧で固めて、
森の中を我が物顔で闊歩していたのだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_CHANSTELOUP_000_011<tab>Mark my words─the trees themselves were quivering in fear that night. I've not slept a wink since I returned.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_CHANSTELOUP_000_011<tab>情けないことだが……
あのときは恐ろしさで足が震えてしまった。
森の樹木ですら、恐れをなしてるように見えたくらいだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TATASOSA_000_020<tab>Eeeyaaah! D-Don't sneak up on me like that, friend!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TATASOSA_000_020<tab>ぶるぶるぶる……恐ろしいんだな……。
森の中、真っ黒な騎士を見たんだな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TATASOSA_000_021<tab>Forgive me─ever since espying a glimpse of that ghastly horseman, my heart won't stop racing. I knew the elementals would punish us sooner or later for daring to disobey their will. This is surely a sign of sinister happenings to come.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_TATASOSA_000_021<tab>黒くて巨大な獣を駆る、その不気味な姿……！
きっと、森によくないことが起きる前兆なんだな。
精霊様がお怒りなのかな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_HONORAINT_000_030<tab>Aye, saw him clear as day─or clear as night, ye might say─with me own two eyes. More fearsome than the rider was his ghastly steed─I know not where ye've traveled, but I can assure you ye've not seen more frightenin' a beast. One thing I can tell ye, friend─that was no specter or shadow. Nay, he was as solid as you or me.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_HONORAINT_000_030<tab>……亡霊騎士だろ、ああ、この目で見たよ。
チョコボやアンテロープとはまったく違う、
大きな黒い獣に乗った騎士……あれは幽霊なんかじゃないさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_AEDAN_000_040<tab>Yes, I saw the black knight─after which I promptly fled for my dear life. Should you end up in my position, you'd be wise to do the same.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_AEDAN_000_040<tab>森に現れたあの漆黒の鎧の騎士、
……あれはきっと良くないものだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_AEDAN_000_041<tab>I have my pride, but I am not fool enough to cast my life away. Besides, one look was enough to know─this is a manifestation of pure evil. Were he to turn that massive sword against Gridania, all of our lances as one could not hope to stand in his way.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_AEDAN_000_041<tab>あんなに大きく、禍々しい剣を持った者が、
害をなさないわけがない……。
……我々鬼哭隊が束になっても、おそらく敵わんだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_050<tab>A knight clad in shadow-forged armor. A mammoth sword and hells-born steed. It is clear now─our worst forebodings have proven most unfortunately prescient.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_LEWIN_000_050<tab>……なるほどな。
巨大な黒い獣にまたがった、漆黒の鎧の騎士……か。
……残念だが、我々の推測が当たってしまったようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_Q1_000_100<tab>Proceed to the Seat of the First Bow?
target: TEXT_GAIUSC608_01008_Q1_000_100<tab>「神勇隊司令室」へ移動しますか？
